lines.gurmukhi: drsn joiq ko audoq suK swgr mY koitk ausqq Cib iql ko pRgws hY
lines.transliteration_english: Darasan Joti Ko Udot Soukh Saagar Mai , Kotik Ousatat Chhabi Til Ko Pragaas Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The radiance of the light of the True Guru, the ocean of happiness and comfort is repository of all the happiness of the world. A glimmer of light no more than a sesame seed has generated radiance of millions of beauties and adulations in the world.

lines.gurmukhi: ikMcq kiRpw koitk kmlw klpqr mDur bcn mDu koitk iblws hY
lines.transliteration_english: Kinchat Kripaa Kotik Kamalaa Kalapatara , Madhur Bachan Madhu Kotik Bilaas Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: A little kind look of the True Guru has millions of goddesses of wealth and celestial trees capable of fulfilling all desires, hidden in it. Elixir immersed sweet words of the True Guru has millions of relishments of the world.

lines.gurmukhi: mMd muskwin bwin Kwin hY kotwin sis soBw koit lot pot kumudnI qwsu hY
lines.transliteration_english: Mand Mousakaani Baani Khaani Hai Kotaani Sasi , Sobhaa Koti Lot Pot Koumudanee Taasu Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The habit of soft and slow smile of the True Guru is the source of praise of millions of moons. The glory of millions of nymphea flowers is sacrifice unto it.

lines.gurmukhi: mn mDukr mkrMd rs luiBq huie shj smwiD ilv ibsm ibs√çs hY ]294]
lines.transliteration_english: Man Madhoukar Makarand Ras Loubhit Hui , Sahaj Samaadhi Liv Bisam Bisvas Hai ?294?

Shabad OS B.translation: A devoted and loving Sikh of the Guru enamoured by the elixir-like relishment of Naam Simran practiced through the teachings of the True Guru remains absorbed in a state of equipoise and astonishing devotion of the Lord. (294)
